snippet.title: Sonic the Hedgehog: Sonic in Angel Island (Flash Game)
snippet.description:
Now this is another Sonic flash game I've been wanting to post on this channel, and that's Sonic in Angel Island. It has the same character from the very first Sonic game, and just basic Angel Island running as always. Who remembers this one?

Platform:
BlueMaxima's Flashpoint
------------------------------
By Bandicam Screen Recorder (https://www.bandicam.com)
